title: OT35: Boston Comment
summary:
Key Ideas:
- The author is on vacation, so this post is an open thread for readers to discuss anything they want.
- The subreddit is still available for those who prefer a different commenting system.
- A reader named Sarah wrote an excellent comment about the gift horse idiom.
- The author is thankful for the positive feedback from his recent talks in the Northeast and Boston meetup.
- A company called MealSquares is seeking a nutrition expert to advise in exchange for equity.
- A blogger named Nathan Robinson is crowdfunding a new political analysis and entertainment magazine.

Key Learnings:
- This post is an open thread for readers to freely discuss any topic.
- The author values positive feedback from his events and meetups.
- A company named MealSquares is offering equity in exchange for an expert nutritionist.
- Nathan Robinson is offering subscriptions and donations for his new political analysis and entertainment magazine.

Key Questions:
- None provided in this post.
